title: Happy Hour: Round And Round
author: Christy Frink
contentEncoded:
• Metro Police Sgt. Mark Chesnut, who was shot several times in his police car along I-40 over the summer, is finally back home and still recovering. We’re happy to hear he’s doing well! [Sylvan Park Neighborhood Association]
  • Nashville MTA is rolling out it’s new Bus Rapid Transit (BRT) service starting this weekend. [City Paper]
  • We know it’s a slow news day when we start seeing headlines about geese pooping on middle school soccer fields so much that no one can play soccer there anymore. [Tennessean]
  • Related, today’s quote of the day comes to us from Councilwoman Vivian Wilhoite: “They are trying to tell me that this is an act of God. Don’t ever tell me that it is an act of God for him to put poop in a man’s house.” [WKRN via Post Politics]
  • Too soon. [WSMV]
